LanguageData.GR_Spinobear.label: spinobear
LanguageData.GR_Spinobear.description: This hybrid therapod has bear-like characteristics. There are several theories concerning the use of the Spinosaur's spinal fan-sail, but in the case of the Spinobear it is clear what use it has: kicking your ass.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All bear hybrids have stun attacks. Aside from obviously being a very powerful creature, they produce a weird mixture of wool and scales that can be sheared and used in textile operations. They can also be slaughtered for their pelts. Like all dinosaur hybrids, they are oviparous.
LanguageData.GR_Spinobear.tools.0.label: left leg
LanguageData.GR_Spinobear.tools.1.label: right leg
LanguageData.GR_Spinobear.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.GR_Spinobear_Leather.label: spinobear leather
LanguageData.GR_Spinobear_Meat.label: dinosaur meat
LanguageData.GR_Spinobear_Corpse.label: spinobear corpse
LanguageData.GR_Parasaurolope.label: parasaurolope
LanguageData.GR_Parasaurolope.description: This hybrid ornithopod has two cranial crests, which it uses in mating rituals. Their whole body is covered in large sacs of volatile chemicals.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> This animal was created with one goal in mind: to produce huge amounts of chemfuel. Their corpses can be directly refined into compressed chemfuel in a biorefinery.
LanguageData.GR_Parasaurolope.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Parasaurolope_Leather.label: parasaurolope leather
LanguageData.GR_Parasaurolope_Corpse.label: parasaurolope corpse
LanguageData.GR_Chickennathus.label: chickennathus
LanguageData.GR_Chickennathus.description: It is often said that birds are little more than evolved dinosaurs. Well, this small theropod hybrid is both a dinosaur AND a bird. Take that, science!\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Chickennathus are great egg layers.
LanguageData.GR_Chickennathus.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_Chickennathus.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_Chickennathus.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.GR_Chickennathus_Leather.label: chickennathus leather
LanguageData.GR_Chickennathus_Corpse.label: chickennathus corpse
LanguageData.GR_Diplobeetle.label: diplobeetle
LanguageData.GR_Diplobeetle.description: This huge sauropod hybrid has notable insectoid traits. It is hard to see how such a creature could have any predators, since it would probably leave its herbivorous diet and just eat them whole.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All insectoid hybrids have good armor and no toxic sensitivity, but they are always sterile and can't reproduce, even if a fertility booster is used to create them. Diplobeetles produce a very nutritive jelly.
LanguageData.GR_Diplobeetle.tools.0.label: tail
LanguageData.GR_Diplobeetle.tools.1.label: left leg
LanguageData.GR_Diplobeetle.tools.2.label: right leg
LanguageData.GR_Triceraffalo.label: triceraffalo
LanguageData.GR_Triceraffalo.description: This enormous ceratopsid can be used as an incredibly powerful pack beast. It is also quite capable of defending itself, with its sheer mass and huge horns.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Produces wool, eggs, milk, and acts as a very powerful, though slow, pack beast.
LanguageData.GR_Triceraffalo.tools.0.label: horns
LanguageData.GR_Triceraffalo.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Triceraffalo_Leather.label: triceraffalo leather
LanguageData.GR_Triceraffalo_Corpse.label: triceraffalo corpse
LanguageData.GR_Raptortoise.label: raptortoise
LanguageData.GR_Raptortoise.description: This raptor theropod has strange turtle traits. Why strange? Well, if you picture an armored dinosaur you tend to imagine something like an ankylosaurus, not a raptor with a tortoise shell on its back.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All reptile hybrids have good temperature tolerance ranges and venomous attacks.
LanguageData.GR_Raptortoise.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_Raptortoise.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_Raptortoise.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.GR_Raptortoise_Leather.label: raptortoise leather
LanguageData.GR_Raptortoise_Corpse.label: raptortoise corpse
LanguageData.GR_Stegothrumbo.label: stegothrumbo
LanguageData.GR_Stegothrumbo.description: A colossal, armored dinosaur-thrumbo hybrid. Probably not as smart as a thrumbo, but it makes up for it by being incredibly tough.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All colossal hybrids have very slow attacks, but hit very hard, and possess natural armor. Greater stamina ability: twice per day, the Stegothrumbo can become almost impervious to damage.
LanguageData.GR_Stegothrumbo.tools.0.label: tail
LanguageData.GR_Stegothrumbo.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.GR_Stegothrumbo_Leather.label: stegothrumbo leather
LanguageData.GR_Stegothrumbo_Corpse.label: stegothrumbo corpse
LanguageData.GR_Velociwolf.label: velociwolf
LanguageData.GR_Velociwolf.description: This raptor theropod hybrid escaped the shame of having feathers by instead having hair. So, uhm, still ridiculous.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> All canine hybrids get the Adrenaline rush ability, which allows them to move at 200% speed for a short time, but be tired and move slower for half a day afterwards.
LanguageData.GR_Velociwolf.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_Velociwolf.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_Velociwolf.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.GR_Velociwolf_Leather.label: velociwolf leather
LanguageData.GR_Velociwolf_Corpse.label: velociwolf corpse
